TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebPartHelpMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定用于显示 控件的帮助内容的用户界面 (UI) 的可用类型。

span.span: Specifies the available types of user interfaces (UIs) for displaying Help content for a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性用于确定浏览器显示的控件的帮助内容的方式。The property is used to determine how a browser will display Help content for a control. 枚举包含的值可以应用于属性。The enumeration contains values that can be applied to the property. 默认值为属性是模式。The default value for the property is Modal. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性来显示相同的浏览器窗口中的控件有关的帮助。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to display Help for a control in the same browser window. 此示例中的第一部分都假定使用一个自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的示例部分中找到类概述。The first part of this example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例还包括一个包含虚构的帮助内容的 HTML 页面`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The code example also includes an HTML page that contains fictitious Help content for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 对于此示例正常工作，必须将以下代码保存在一个名为 Textwebparthelp.htm 文件并将其放在你的网站与.aspx 页相同的目录。For this example to work, you must save the following code in a file named Textwebparthelp.htm and place it in the same directory of your site as the .aspx page. ``` Text Content WebPart Help

Text Content WebPart Help

To make the WebPart control work...
``` 该示例的最后一部分是演示如何引用一个网页`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The final part of the example is a Web page that shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 请注意，在声明性标记属性值设置为导航，并且此代码还设置的值属性设置为包含帮助内容的 HTML 文件的名称。Note that in the declarative markup, the property value is set to Navigate, and the code also sets the value of the property to the name of the HTML file that contains the Help content. 页加载到浏览器中，并单击上的谓词菜单的帮助谓词控件。Load the page into a browser, and click the help verb on the verbs menu of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode/CS/helpmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_HelpMode/VB/helpmodevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode Modal = int32(0)

summary.span: 打开一个单独的浏览器窗口（如果浏览器具有此功能）。

span.span: Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability.

summary.span: 用户在返回到 Web 部件页之前必须关闭该窗口。

span.span: A user must close the window before returning to the Web Parts page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode Modeless = int32(1)

summary.span: 打开一个单独的浏览器窗口（如果浏览器具有此功能）。

span.span: Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability.

summary.span: 用户在返回到网页之前无需关闭该窗口。

span.span: A user does not have to close the window before returning to the Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode Navigate = int32(2)

summary.span: 替换浏览器窗口中的“Web 部件”页。

span.span: Replaces the Web Parts page in the browser window.
